1038080.name: FortressCraft : Phoenix
1038080.description:
The third iteration of the game that invented the Factory genre is now available. Based on the award-winning FortressCraft :Evolved, FortressCraft :Phoenix takes the over-the-top base building and survival gameplay and cranks it up a hundred times. Build your mining base with literally hundreds of thousands of machines in it, explore an alien landscape, both overground and kilometres deep underground.

A Voxel base builder for the next generation. Phoenix builds upon Evolved's successful formula and adds a solid base of state of the art rendering, allowing you to build and visualise your factory base as never before.

Explore from a palette of literally trillions of unique worlds, tailored to the difficulty and challenge you enjoy.

Also. Trains are in from the start. So. There's that.
